info.title: OpenAPI 3.1 Specification for CoffeeShop
info.summary: Sample Coffee Shop Server based on the OpenAPI 3.1 specification.
info.description: This is a sample Coffee Shop Server based on the OpenAPI 3.1 specification. It's the first version and includes several areas, such as 'Menu', 'Order', 'User', 'Inventory', 'Notification', and more. We plan to add more features in the future. Please refer to this sample and help us improve it. If you want to learn more about OpenAPI, you can follow the link to XapiiHub [https://xapihub.io/].

password.description: This is the users password. The password must be relevant to the configuration
This is the users password. The password must be relevant to the configuration

username.description: This is the users preferred unique user name

email.description: This is the users email ID

phoneNumber.description: phone number in E.164 format. Should be a unique phone number

status.description: Whether the user is currently active

location.description: Location url from a map api

summary.example: This is star point loyalty program

expirationDuration.description: The number of months before points expire. Example for 10 days, 10 hours, 30 minutes, and 30 seconds:P20DT10H30M30S

phoneNumber.description: Buyer phone number in E.164 format. The phone number should be unique.

accrualType.description: The type of accrual rule that defines how buyers earn point

pointCount.description: Number of point the buyers can earn

pointRate.description: How much money which need to be spent to get one point

count.description: Number of ordered from the menu
Number of ordered from the menu

rejectedValue.description: This is the rejected value belong to error field
